Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays at Rosemont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays at Rosemont.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87th Temporary Reroute at 87th/Avalon
ShortDescription: 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 87th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, Stony Island, and 87th, due to, street blockage, near 87th/Avalon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 87th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, Stony Island, and 87th, due to, street blockage, near 87th/Avalon.

Allow extra travel time.
